publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2709 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Lothian and Borders Progress 2 Work Projectâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Lothian and Borders Progress 2 Work Project for its success in placing 100 people in work and its commitment to helping to reintegrate people with a history of drug misuse into employment; notes that there are many more clients attending training courses and college, and congratulates this Jobcentre Plus initiative, partnered with Apex Scotland and Phoenix House.
